events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your qualifications soon.
Your application was categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience in software development and programming.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and they will be reaching out shortly to coordinate the next steps.
We completed the initial screening interview and were impressed by your technical knowledge and problem-solving skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed with the technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm and professionalism.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and ensure you have a stable internet connection.
The technical interview went very well, and we were impressed by your coding skills and ability to explain complex concepts clearly.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 3 PM UTC. This interview will cover cultural fit and company policies.
You completed the HR interview successfully. The interviewer mentioned that you seem to be a great match for our team culture.
We are pleased to extend an offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the offer letter and let us know if you have any questions.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We appreciate your excitement about joining the team.
We have received your acceptance of the job offer. Congratulations and welcome aboard!
Your onboarding process has begun with an orientation session scheduled. We look forward to helping you get settled into your new role.
The recruitment case has been successfully closed. The candidate is now fully hired and part of the engineering team.
